original_text:
“But my people would not listen to me;
    Israel would not submit to me.
korean_text: 내 백성이 내 소리를 듣지 아니하며 이스라엘이 나를 원하지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: But my people would not listen to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내 백성이 내게 듣지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: Israel would not submit to me
